import React from 'react' import {Table, Row,Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import { withRouter } from 'next/router' class CustomerTab extends React.Component { constructor (props) { super(props) } render() { let {customer} = this.props if(! customer) return null return (
Nom complet: {customer.gender} {customer.lastname} {customer.firstname}
CNI: {customer.cni}
Téléphone: {customer.phone}
E-mail: {customer.email}
Adresse: {customer.address}
{customer.city}
) } } export default withRouter(CustomerTab)
